attires.name: Kamarband
attires.description: An ornamental waist belt, often made of gold or silver, worn by Indian women over sarees or lehengas for weddings and festivals.

attires.name: Oddiyanam
attires.description: A traditional South Indian waist belt, usually broad and ornate, worn by women during weddings and classical dances.

attires.name: Silver Waist Chain
attires.description: A delicate silver chain worn around the waist, popular among Indian women for both daily wear and special occasions.
